summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 192 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1776 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), outside temperature (up 2.7°C), and rainfall (down 2.1 mm) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, humidity should not be a concern and little or no wind. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
